title.en: I Know This Sounds All Very Sudden, But I Just Swapped Bodies With the Guy I Like and Now We’re About to Have Sex?!

altTitles.ja: 突然ですが、気になる同期と入れ替わってHするコトになりました!?

description.en: “I want you to know just how much my body wants you, Kayama.” The more he messed me up the more I couldn’t hold back my cries. Shibuko Kayama, in accounting. Can’t say no to anyone. Kento Kaburagi, in sales. Extremely popular with the ladies. One unfortunate day, Shibuko ended up falling down a flight of stairs, and even though Kaburagi tried to help her, he ended up being injured as well. When they both awaken, Shibuko finds herself in Kaburagi’s body and Kaburagi is in her’s! Inexperienced, Shibuko doesn’t know how to handle a male body, so Kaburagi tells her that he’ll ‘teach her’ and pushes her slowly onto the bed... It’s her own face and voice, and yet she’s completely aware that it’s the guy she likes who is touching her all over... Touching her in places that no one else has... until she orgasms like crazy! Will they end up going all the way, trapped in the other’s bodies...?!
